synopsis.text: Locodol follows two high school girls, Nanako and Yukari, who are recruited by Nanako's uncle to become local idols in their small town of Nagarekawa. Though inexperienced, the duo forms the locodol unit Nagarekawa Girls. As local idols, they make appearances around town at malls, on local TV, and at small live events to help promote Nagarekawa. After the success of the Locodol anime series, a new OVA was announced via the official Twitter account. The announcement came at the 2nd Early Summer Nagarekawa Festival event in Tokyo, which featured the main cast. Details revealed so far are: - Christmas Special themed first episode - Second episode about the girls making a music video The OVA promises more entertaining adventures with Nanako, Yukari, and the rest of the Nagarekawa Girls as they continue their local idol activities and bring excitement to their small town. With the charming characters and fun premise of the original series, the OVA is sure to delight fans.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
